verses.roman:
taṁ pādayor nipatitam
ayathā-pūrvam āturam
adho-vadanam ab-bindūn
sṛjantaṁ nayanābjayoḥ

synonyms: tam—him (Arjuna); pādayoḥ—at the feet; nipatitam—bowing down; ayathā-pūrvam—unprecedented; āturam—dejected; adhaḥ-vadanam—downward face; ap-bindūn—drops of water; sṛjantam—creating; nayana-abjayoḥ—from the lotuslike eyes.
translation: When he bowed at his feet, the King saw that his dejection was unprecedented. His head was down, and tears glided from his lotus eyes.
